title: Surface Coating of 9 384-well Plates
author: Opentrons
description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform surface coating for up to 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.

You will need:
 P300 Single-channel Pipette/P50 Multi-channel Pipette/P300 Multi-channel Pipette
 384-well Plate
 Finntip™ Filtered 300 uL Tip Rack
 (Reagent Reservoir)[https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/1200-1300]
process:
Select pipette and pipette mount.
Input the start tip to use for this run.
Input the number of plates to process for this run.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will fill 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.
Robot will pause for manual steps.
Robot will fill 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.
Robot will pause for manual steps.
Robot will fill 9 384-well plate with 50 uL reagent.
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Surface Coating of 9 384-well Plates
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
With this protocol, your robot can perform surface coating for up to 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.

---

You will need:
* P300 Single-channel Pipette/P50 Multi-channel Pipette/P300 Multi-channel Pipette
* 384-well Plate
* [Finntip™ Filtered 300 uL Tip Rack](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/94052350?SID=srch-hj-94052350)
* (Reagent Reservoir)[https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/1200-1300]
markdown.process:
1. Select pipette and pipette mount.
2. Input the start tip to use for this run.
3. Input the number of plates to process for this run.
4. Download your protocol.
5. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
6. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
7. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
8. Hit "Run".
9. Robot will fill 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.
10. Robot will pause for manual steps.
11. Robot will fill 9 384-well plates with 50 uL reagent.
12. Robot will pause for manual steps.
13. Robot will fill 9 384-well plate with 50 uL reagent.
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
